com.sun.tools.example.trace
Class EventThread.ThreadTrace

java.lang.Object
  pt.ipbeja.estig.sd.TraceSource
      com.sun.tools.example.trace.EventThread.ThreadTrace
Enclosing class:
EventThread
public class EventThread.ThreadTrace
extends TraceSource

This class keeps context on events in one thread. In this implementation, context is the indentation prefix. Modified to Support Sequence Diagram by Nuno Fortes
